column1: (1) Causing the death of one Krishantha Malinga on 25th December 2003

column2: punishable in terms of section 296 of the Penal Code.

column1: (2) At the same time and at the same transaction, committing the offence

column2: of  attempted  murder  of  one  Shrimal  Nilantha  Fernando,  an  offence
punishable in terms of section 300 of the Penal Code.

column1: (3) At the same time and at the same transaction, committing the offence

column2: of  attempted  murder  on  one  Lasantha  Saman  Kumara,  an  offence
punishable in terms of section 300 of the Penal Code.
